rules_text:
Stalwart Guardian has first strike as long as it's attacking.
[i]Augmented[/i] – When Stalwart Guardian enters the battlefield, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, create two 1/1 blue Elemental creature tokens with flying.
flavor_text: [i]“The abominations say that everything must go. Well I don't think so.”[/i]
notes:
Before I Wake — I Fight Dragons
